name: chrissy king
text: I live in Park Hills, MO But my sister and her family recently moved to St. James. The day they were getting moved I wanted to treat them to dinner. I tried ordering online but had a bit of trouble. I called the store there and explained …More

name: Alex K
text: Very friendly staff!!!

name: Jerry Scott
text: St James pizza hut was kind, fast, and did up the pizza great.

name: Jeremiah Gill
text: Order extra marinara sauce and they will deliver it to you with NO sauce.. this has happened more than once. and just forget about crust flavor, they NEVER add it. If you order in the store be sure and double check everything because I swear they don't even pay attention to the order.

name: Adam Klotz
text: Says it's open on google maps, but its burnt down. It's safe to say, this place isn't open.

name: Nikki Briggs
text: We ordered several pizzas and had an issue, I called and spoke with Karen and she went above and beyond to make sure we had a great experience!

name: Sharon Ann Davis
text: Fast service Friendly employees good pizza

name: Jessica Warner
text: Rude.My friend ordered 3 things around 9 lastnight and it took about an hour to get here. We called and asked for a refund and they said they would give a discount, few minutes later they showed up with only two things. He told us he was …More

name: Thunder Sky
text: Fresh pizza and ingredients. Great staff and drinks get refilled often. It could use some tv though.

name: Madyson Rolfes
text: I ordered for delivery and asked them to come to out back door behind our truck. the delivery guyed pulled in our driveway then pulled out and parked on the sidewalk in our front yard in his car and rang our door bell 5 times and i was on a business call!  Please read delivery instructions. Other than that my food is great!

name: Chris Miller
text:
Lunch Buffet sucks.
Never any decent choices.
Restaurant is old and outdated. Not to mention very unclean.

name: David Colvin
text: As with most fast food this place has its off-nights. Most of the time our food is good. We always order carryout so I can't vouch for the dine-in experience but our food is always hot and fresh.

name: Connie Weigel
text: Very nice and fast service too

name: grandma Dar
text: I love this pizza hut we go there a lot to set and talk to our friends and relax and the service is great

name: Dave D
text: Ordered cheesy bread got breadsticks dusted with parmesan cheese whoopie not that good either

name: So sweet
text: Best place to.eat and.work

name: Michael Meyer
text: Decent food

name: Inquisitive Minds
text: Took almost 25 minutes before they took our order. However, they were very short staffed. The server was very friendly when she did arrive and they did give a discount because of the wait. Honestly, I kinda felt sorry for these guys cause some looked a bit frazzled.

name: Marcus Burris
text: Haven't disappointed yet. Pan crust is still my  favorite

name: Jimi Uphoff
text: Ordered a pizza soda and dipping sauce didn't get the soda or dipping sauce and the pizza was all over the lid of the box... not to mention it wasn't even hot. Terrible pizza hut do not order from here

name: Travis Bennet
text: Our pizza was not completely cooked. It was terrible. It's always empty but who would eat there,  it is not clean at all.

name: John Marshall
text: Pizza Hut in St. James is awesome! Great customer service and friendly staff.

name: Michael Gray
text: Pizza is pretty decent. Miss the dinner buffet, as it was the best evening buffet in the area. Good lunch buffet.

name: Kenice Mendoza
text: I work their geuss I'm bias but I like my job and the people I work with

name: Marty Ayers
text: This was our first visit to this Pizza Hut. The staff was super friendly and the buffet was always very well stocked. We will be going back in the future.

name: David Meade
text: Nice freindly staff worked to acomadate us very tasty food

name: Donna Leckrone
text: Overpriced for the quality

name: Estin Foust
text: Great service and fresh food bar

name: William Mitchell
text: Food was good, nice people.

name: Kenneth Perry
text: When I visited, the restaurant was pretty empty. There were three or four male employees sitting around doing nothing, having a very, very loud and vulgar conversation. Like shouting and yelling. The only person who seemed to be doing any …More

name: Jason Sell
text: If I could give it no stars i would! Complete disappointed with this pizza hut. Even was told when u put a pizza back in oven it makes it soggy. What a joke! They obviously dont need to be working there at all

name: Dennis Sullivan
text: Great Pizza. Slow service

name: Donna Setzer
text: They don't have lava cakes any more

name: Rhonda Hatcher
text: Service was good

name: J Folk
text: The building maybe showing its age inside and out but the servers were friendly and the food was hot

name: Clinton Eppler
text: Good pizza

name: Roger Huskey
text: Just waited over an hour for my pizzas, Didnt even offer anything free!!

name: mikita klishanets
text: Close

name: Bob Terrill
text: Great

name: Rebeca Vaughn
text: Eevn though they were super busy, the waitress never forgot about us and always came to make sure we got refills or if we needed anything!

name: Roy Fannon
text: Great pizza

name: Rev Paul E. Goddard
